dfischer.utils

Class XmlDoctypeCommentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.XmlDoctypeCommentParser

  • public class XmlDoctypeCommentParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Extract and set in an XML the DOCTYPE comment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlDoctypeCommentParser

        public XmlDoctypeCommentParser(java.lang.String xmlDocument)
        Create a new instance
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstComment

        public java.lang.String getFirstComment(int searchMaxElements)
        Get the XML DOCTYPE comment.
        Parameters:
        searchMaxElements - max number of XML elements until the search for the XML DOCTYPE comment is aborted. Recommended value = 2.
        Returns:
        the DOCTYPE comment, or null if no such comment was found.

      • setXmlDocument

        public void setXmlDocument(java.lang.String xmlDocument)
        Set a new XML document
        Parameters:
        xmlDocument -

      • replaceFirstComment

        public void replaceFirstComment(java.lang.String newComment)
        Replace an existing XML DOCTYPE comment. Note: the method getFirstComment(int searchMaxElements) must be called first before this method can be called.
        Parameters:
        newComment - the new XML DOCTYPE comment, it's also allowed to pass a null value if the XML document contains no DOCTYPE comment.

      • replaceFirstComment

        public java.lang.String replaceFirstComment(java.lang.String nodifiedXmldDocument,
                                   java.lang.String newComment)
        Replace an existing XML DOCTYPE comment in a modified XML document. Note: the method getFirstComment(int searchMaxElements) must be called first before this method can be called.
        Parameters:
        nodifiedXmldDocument - the modified XML document
        newComment - the new XML DOCTYPE comment, it's also allowed to pass a null value if the XML document contains no DOCTYPE comment.
        Returns:
        the modified XML document containing the new XML DOCTYPE comment

      • getXmlDocument

        public java.lang.String getXmlDocument()
        Get the XML document
        Returns:
        the XML document

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Internal test program.
